nodes.bodyText: I'd put this attribute after the double iterator() clarification, otherwise it reads as a detail of discard and will be ignored

nodes.bodyText: actually I see that Intellij still doesn't show all the content of these custom tags. Maybe we need to rework all that part of the javadoc to mention the discard caveats in the body and just use the tags as markers or something 🤔
